ui.app_description: This application facilitates data organization, tracking, and analysis by providing complete and automated documentation of Power BI reports. Ideal for administrators and analysts seeking efficiency and precision in generating detailed and formatted documentation.
ui.app_id_help: Enter the App ID registered in Azure AD
ui.tenant_id_help: Enter the Azure AD Tenant ID
ui.secret_value_help: Enter the Secret Value of the registered App
ui.file_upload_help: Select one or more Power BI template files
ui.report_selector: Which report would you like to view?

messages.authentication_required: Please fill in all authentication information (App ID, Tenant ID, Secret Value)

detailed_description.title: **Power BI Documenter** is a tool developed to simplify and automate the Power BI report documentation process.
detailed_description.feature_1: **Load your Power BI template files (.pbit or .zip)**: Upload your template files directly into the application.
detailed_description.feature_2: **Generate Detailed Documentation**: Get complete documents in Excel and Word formats, with information about tables, columns, measures, and data sources.
detailed_description.feature_3: **Interactive Visualization**: View detailed tables and data directly in the application interface before downloading.
detailed_description.feature_4: **Efficiency and Precision**: Automate the documentation process, saving time and ensuring information accuracy.
detailed_description.purpose: The application is designed for data administrators and analysts who need an efficient and accurate way to generate high-quality documentation for their Power BI reports. The tool uses advanced data processing and artificial intelligence technologies to provide clear, detailed, and formatted documentation according to your needs.
detailed_description.how_to_use: **How to use the Power BI Documenter**:
detailed_description.step_1: 1. Fill in the App ID, Tenant ID, and Secret Value information in the sidebar.
detailed_description.step_2: 2. Upload the Power BI template file (.pbit or .zip).
detailed_description.step_3: 3. View the data and download the generated documentation in Excel or Word formats.
detailed_description.conclusion: Simplify and automate the documentation of your Power BI reports with the **Power BI Documenter**.

chat.title: üí¨ Chat with Documentation
chat.input_placeholder: Type your question about the documentation...
chat.system_prompt:
1 - You are an expert in analyzing Power BI report models. Your function is to respond clearly and in detail to any question asked by the user.
2 - The report information is contained below between the tags: <START POWER BI REPORT DATA> and <END POWER BI REPORT DATA>.
3 - Your responses must be restricted to the information contained in the Power BI report.

Below is the Power BI report information to be used as a basis for answering user questions:
<START POWER BI REPORT DATA>
{document_text_all}
<END POWER BI REPORT DATA>

<REPORT COLUMNS>
{colunas_texto}
</REPORT COLUMNS>

<REPORT RELATIONSHIPS>
{relacionamentos_texto}
</REPORT RELATIONSHIPS>
chat.system_instruction: always respond within tables and always create descriptions of tables, measures, relationships, columns and data sources.
chat.assistant_greeting: Hi! üòä How are you? Here is your AutoDoc assistant. I have your report '{report_name}' loaded in memory! You can ask questions about tables, DAX measures, columns and relationships.

errors.file_not_supported: File type not supported. Please use .pbit or .zip files.
errors.authentication_failed: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.
errors.network_error: Connection error. Please check your internet connection.
errors.no_data_found: No data found in the selected file.
